exercises.title: Variables
exercises.instructions:
Assign variables for integers, strings, and booleans.

Use both the shorthand and long form methods.

Then print each variable.

exercises.title: Constants
exercises.instructions: Create a constant and print it.

exercises.title: Looping
exercises.instructions: Create a simple for loop that prints 1-10.

exercises.title: If/Else
exercises.instructions: Create an if/else statement that prints "true" if a variable is true and "false" if it is false.

exercises.title: Switching
exercises.instructions: Create a switch statement that prints "one" if a variable is 1, "two" if it is 2, and "other" if it is anything else.

exercises.title: Arrays
exercises.instructions: Create an array of strings and print each string using a For loop.

exercises.title: Slices
exercises.instructions: Create a slice of strings and print each string using a For loop.

exercises.title: Maps
exercises.instructions: Create a map of strings and print each key/value pair using a For loop.
